seealso|West High School "for schools of the same name"

West High School is a Public school high school located in Bakersfield, California. The school serves about 2500 students in grades 9 to 12 in the Kern High School District.

General information

West High was built in 1965. The school mascot is the Vikings.

â€¢ Twice a California Distinguished School, 1986 and 1996.

Demographics

* Total student enrollment = 2,525

* Student Body Demographics:::49.8% Hispanic, 26.4% White, 19% Black, 2.4% Asian, 2.3% Other

* 107 Certificated employees

* 56 Classified staff members

* 6 Administrators

* 6 Counselors

Activities

* There are more than 50 clubs and activity programs, and there are more than 300 student athletes competing in 32 athletic teams on campus.

* Award winning NJROTC Program.

Facts

* Has responded to changes in student population with increases in interdisciplinary studies, academic support programs and an increased use of technology.

* Mentoring and academic support programs to assist student achievement like General Studies Support, Supplementary Support Classes, Project BEST for African-American male students and Movimiento Estudiantil Chicano de Aztlan (MECHA) for Hispanic students.

* Extensive offering of ROP classes on site and at the ROP Center.

* Some special programs include: Advanced Placement, English Language Learners, GATE, Honors, Black Excellence in Scholarship and Teaching, Advanced Math/Science, Regional Occupational Program, Special Education, and award winning Forensics and Fine Arts programs.

West High Alma Mater

:We are the vikings of the Valley standing true and bold :bravely waving all our colors shining green and gold :friendships we will cherish always upward our goals will lie:to you we proudly sing our praises :HAIL AL HAIL WEST HIGH

Notable alumni

*Nikki Blue, WNBA basketball player [cite web |url=http://www.wnba.com/playerfile/nikki_blue/index.html |title=WNBA.com: Nikki Blue Player File |publisher=WNBA |accessdate=2008-03-04] [cite web |url=http://www.wnba.com/draft2006/prospect_nikki_blue.html |title=WNBA.com: Prospect - Nikki Blue |publisher=WNBA |accessdate=2008-03-04]

* Ryan Matthews, Currently a Sophomore at Fresno st.
